package.name: or_circularsmoother
package.description:
An OpenRAVE wrapper to an algorithm for computing a time-optimal trajectory to follow a path with bounded acceleration and velocity.
It is based on code provided by Tobias Kunz: https://github.com/tobiaskunz/trajectories
which implements the technique described in the paper: Time-Optimal Trajectory Generation for Path Following with Bounded Acceleration and Velocity by Tobias Kunz and Mike Stilman, appearing in RSS 2008,
package.author: Michael Koval
Pras Velagapudi
Tobias Kunz
